option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Aquatrack">
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".ProductionActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".StockActivity" android:exported="false" />
</application>
</manifest>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:networkSecurityConfig="@xml/network_security_config" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Aquatrack">
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".ProductionActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".StockActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".TesterActivity" android:exported="false" />
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <solid android:color="@color/white"/> <corners android:radius="12dp"/> <stroke android:width="2dp" android:color="@color/blue_accent"/> </shape>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Stock Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No stock date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Stock" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbarStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/blue_primary" app:title="Aquatrack" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="10dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/textStockTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Stock: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="10dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/textDispatchTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Dispatched: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp" android:ellipsize="end"/> android:maxLines="2" </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDispatchSection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone"> <!-- Dispatch Section UI here --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Add Dispatch" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter dispatch quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextDispatchQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Dispatch" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutStockSection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone"> <!-- Stock Section UI here --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Update Stock" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter stock quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextStockQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbarStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/blue_primary" app:title="Aquatrack" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="10dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/textStockTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Stock: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="8dp"> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/cardDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white" android:padding="10dp" android:visibility="gone" android:elevation="2dp"> <TextView android:id="@+id/textDispatchTotal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Total Dispatched: -" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:padding="8dp" android:ellipsize="end"/> android:maxLines="2" </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDispatchSection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone"> <!-- Dispatch Section UI here --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Add Dispatch" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter dispatch quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextDispatchQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitDispatch" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Dispatch" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutStockSection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="gone"> <!-- Stock Section UI here --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Update Stock" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingTop="12dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Enter stock quantity" app:boxBackgroundMode="outline" app:boxStrokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/editTextStockQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSelectStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Choose Stock Date" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_button" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_menu_my_calendar" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="2dp"/> <TextView android:id="@+id/textSelectedStockDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No stock date selected" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:paddingLeft="2dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif"/> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitStock" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Stock" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"/> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbarTester" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/blue_primary" app:title="Aquatrack - Testing" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Status" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerStatus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Testing Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/editTextTestingQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:hint="Enter quantity" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitTesting" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Testing" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Testing History" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="8dp"/>
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutTestingHistory" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" />
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/white">
<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar android:id="@+id/toolbarTester" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/blue_primary" app:title="Aquatrack - Testing" app:titleTextColor="@color/white" app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent"> <LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp">
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="18dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Select Product" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerProduct" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Status" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<Spinner android:id="@+id/spinnerStatus" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/spinner_whiteborder" android:paddingLeft="12dp" android:paddingRight="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:visibility="visible"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Testing Quantity" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:paddingBottom="4dp"/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/editTextTestingQuantity" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="number" android:hint="Enter quantity" android:textColorHint="@color/blue_grey" android:textColor="@color/blue_dark" android:textSize="16sp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/buttonSubmitTesting" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:text="Submit Testing" app:cornerRadius="12dp" app:backgroundTint="@color/blue_primary" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:elevation="2dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp"/> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Testing History" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/blue_primary" android:paddingBottom="8dp"/>
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:strokeColor="@color/blue_primary" app:strokeWidth="1dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutTestingHistory" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="18dp" /> </com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</LinearLayout> </ScrollView> </LinearLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <item android:id="@+id/action_refresh" android:icon="@drawable/ic_refresh_blue" android:title="Refresh" android:orderInCategory="100" android:showAsAction="always" /> </menu>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"> <item android:id="@+id/action_refresh" android:icon="@drawable/ic_refresh_blue" android:title="Refresh" android:orderInCategory="100" app:showAsAction="always" /> </menu>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Aquatrack" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/purple_200</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/purple_700</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/black</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/teal_200</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/black</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Base application theme. --> <style name="Theme.Aquatrack" parent="Theme.MaterialComponents.DayNight.DarkActionBar"> <!-- Primary brand color. --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/blue_primary</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/blue_dark</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/on_primary</item> <!-- Secondary brand color. --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/blue_accent</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/blue_button</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/on_primary</item> <!-- Status bar color. --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/blue_dark</item> <!-- Customize your theme here. --> </style> </resources>

<color name="white">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_primary">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_button">#2563EB</color> <color name="blue_grey">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="blue_dark">#2563EB</color> <color name="on_primary">#FFFFFF</color> <color name="blue_accent">#2563EB</color> <color name="background">#E5E7EB</color> <color name="surface">#DBEAFE</color> <color name="on_background">#222B45</color> <color name="card">#DBEAFE</color>
